thread.title: Chardon students cope with 2012 shootings through community service, dance (photos, video)
thread.title_full: Chardon students cope with 2012 shootings through community service, dance (photos, video)

author: Grant Segall, The Plain Dealer
title: Chardon students cope with 2012 shootings through community service, dance (photos, video)
text: Chardon High School has responded to the fatal shootings of 2012 by boosting counseling and community service but no longer explicitly commemorates the anniversary.
